definition: Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia

sentences.english: Only the two back-up goalkeepers and central defender Raul Albiol did not get playing time.
sentences.chinese: 只有2个替补守门员和中卫阿尔比奥尔没上场。

sentences.english: Summer signing Phil Jones insists he considers centre-back to be his best position.
sentences.chinese: 夏季签来的琼斯表示自己最擅长中卫的位置。

sentences.english: Smalling is likely to continue at right-back with Jonny Evans and Phil Jones forming a partnership in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 斯莫林可能得继续打右后卫，而琼斯和埃文斯打中卫。

sentences.english: He tied down the two centre-halves and was brilliant all game.
sentences.chinese: 他折磨两个中卫，整场比赛都很牛。

sentences.english: Which defensive duo can be compared to you and Nesta?
sentences.chinese: 哪一中卫组合能与你和内斯塔等同比对？

sentences.english: Juve will want to find a new full-back or two along with a pair of centre backs.
sentences.chinese: 尤文还希望得到一名全能后卫或者一对中卫搭档。

sentences.english: The centre-half was also made captain for the night at the request of Stevie G.
sentences.chinese: 那晚这位中卫在杰拉德的要求下戴上的队长袖标。

sentences.english: One of us centre-backs always has to stay behind.
sentences.chinese: 我们中卫中有一个人一直都必须要留在后面。

sentences.english: As a former Manchester United centre-half, Bruce recognises the benefits of bolting the back door.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名前曼联中卫，布鲁斯明白关紧后门的重要性。

sentences.english: During the Ming Dynasty, it became Shenyang Zhongwei.
sentences.chinese: 在明代，它成为沉阳中卫。

sentences.english: Similarly Jamie Carragher and Sami Hyypia pick themselves in the centre of defence.
sentences.chinese: 同样卡拉格和海皮亚入选了最佳中卫。

sentences.english: He started his ace left halfback on the second half.
sentences.chinese: 在下半场，他派了出色的左中卫上场。

sentences.english: I just hope I can get two centre-halves fit for the match.
sentences.chinese: 我只是希望我能有2个正常的中卫。

sentences.english: Wenger needs a new goalkeeper and cover in central defence.
sentences.chinese: 温格需要签入可以信任的门将和中卫。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
the front line/the attack (e.g. football forwards)
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
